EmailTemplate.subject: ICYMI: HAT is price matching.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ICYMI (In Case You Missed It):
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) is launching a new Airlines Price Match Program for the entire month of August. Under this program, HAT will meet anyone’s USM price on comparable, in-stock Honeywell product. Program guidelines can be found here <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/hat-price-match?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Price_Match]]>.
Why you will love this program?
- You will get quality parts from a trusted OEM. Don’t settle for less than the best. Eliminate the middleman and buy your parts directly from Honeywell. - There’s nothing to lose. If the competitor’s quoted price meets all the program guidelines but we choose not to match the price, you will receive a $500 online credit towards future purchases. This credit expires on 12/30/2020 and must be used on HAT’s GoDirect Trade storefront <https://www.godirecttrade.com/marketplace/seller/profile/shop/HoneywellAerospaceTrading>.
How does the program work?
- Simply provide a valid, non-expired quote. Upon verification of the competitor quote, you will receive your Price Match Offer from HAT. - Applies to Honeywell used equipment only. Non-Honeywell parts are excluded. - Parts must be comparable and similar across a variety of aspects. Part number, model, quantity, OEM, condition, wear and tear, quality of repair tag/certification, trace, and delivery). Life limited parts and units must have comparable and similar times and cycles. Comparable / “like” quality tags should be from authorized Honeywell repair shops or Honeywell repair shops. - Items must be in-stock and immediately available at competing supplier. - Item must be purchased online through www.godirecttrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> in order to be eligible for the price match. - Full list of exclusions, limitations and guidelines on HAT’s Price Match Program can be found here <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/hat-price-match?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Price_Match]]>.
We want to win your business. Buy from a trusted OEM. LEARN MORE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/hat-price-match?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Price_Match]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=User_Growth]]> (powered by Honeywell)
